<JD_START>
Job Title: Senior Business Analyst

Location: Tampa, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Information Technology, Research

Description:
Summary:

This role functions as the liaison between functional business units and the IS organization. Must possess the skills to clearly capture and articulate the client's processes, partner with the client to identify process improvement, and translate strategies into information solutions. Requires strong analytical skills to understand complex business processes, identify problems, and develop solutions. Create detailed documentation, including business requirements documents, user stories, and process flows. Must pay close attention to detail to ensure that requirements are accurately captured and implemented. Work closely with stakeholders, project managers, and development teams, so strong collaboration skills are essential.

Day to Day Responsibilities:

Meeting with stakeholders to gather and clarify requirements for projects or systems.Creating and maintaining documentation such as business requirements documents, functional specifications, and process maps.Building and maintaining relationships with stakeholders to ensure their needs are met and their feedback is incorporated into project decisions.Generating reports and presentations to communicate project status, findings, and recommendations to stakeholders and management.

Top Must Have Skill Sets:

Collaborating with stakeholders to understand their needs and document detailed requirements for projects or systems.Knowledge on GxP and SOX Processes.Creating test plans and scripts, conducting testing, and validating that systems meet requirements and are user-friendly.Documenting current and future state processes to identify areas for improvement and ensure alignment with business goals.Strong documentation and communication skills.Assisting with project management activities, such as creating project plans, tracking progress, and managing scope changes.

Compensation:

The pay rate range above is the base hourly pay range that Aditi Consulting reasonably expects to pay someone for this position (compensation may vary outside of this range depending on a number of factors, including but not limited to, a candidate’s qualifications, skills, competencies, experience, location and end client requirements).

Benefits and Ancillaries:

Medical, dental, vision, PTO benefits and ancillaries may be available for eligible Aditi Consulting employees and vary based on the plan options selected by the employee.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
